CodeList.Name: Multiple Sclerosis Findings About Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Terminology relevant to the test codes that describe multiple sclerosis findings.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A description of the diagnostic criteria that the subject fulfilled in order to establish a medical diagnosis.
The anatomical location of the beginning or early stages of a disease.
A categorization of the number of lesions present in the Central Nervous System at the time of diagnosis of a specific disease.

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Multiple Sclerosis Findings About Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Multiple Sclerosis Findings About Test Code Terminology
